messages.title: Dear Elector
messages.content: On May 7th one of the most amazing General Elections ever in Scotland will come to an end.

messages.title: The Vow
messages.content: Responding to the tactical voting in 2010, Labour or Coalition UK Government promises were not honoured post-election.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Demanding that Westminster delivers on the promises made to the people of Scotland. Opposing austerity, what has led to deprivation in many UK localities and proposing to protect our NHS from privatisation driven by Westminster by international trade agreements.
Standing against the waste of Â£100 billion on immoral and unusable weapons of mass destruction, when we should be investing in public services.

mentions.candidate: the more SNP MPs that are elected, that means the more decisions for our economy and society.
mentions.tacticalSituation: The Vow responding to the tactical voting in 2010

issues.governance: Opposing austerity, what has led to deprivation in many UK localities
issues.health: Demanding that Westminster delivers on the promises made to the people of Scotland... proposing to protect our NHS from privatisation driven by Westminster by international trade agreements.
